content: -> 8 r2-r4 single_crochet around x3 r5 *decrease single_crochet single_crochet repeat from * around -> 6 cut the yarn leaving long tail for sewing and pull it through the loop ears/antlers x2 ch6 row 1 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet to the beginning of the chain ch1 turn row 2 single_crochet from the first single_crochet to the end ch1 turn row 3 single_crochet from the first single_crochet to the end cut the yarn leaving long tail for sewing and pull it through the loop stick a piece of pipe cleaner through the head so that it forms two ears or antlers and sew the pieces on it remember to sew them into the head too tail ch7 = assembly stuff the legs and sew them under the body sew the big wings to the sides of the body sew the small wings above and over the big wings see the picture below sew the tail in the back of the body the position of the wings there is a small tuft at the end of the tail http //its-about-amoena blogspot com/ please do not sell or repost this pattern © amoena & j-r 2008 3 3
